maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-1.json/e.orig: I hate this cave. Way too gloomy and wet. Ruins ma suit, ya know?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-1.json/e.text: Que j'la déteste cette cave. Elle est bien trop sombre et humide. Ça ruine mes fringues, t'sais ?
Oui... J'm'attendais pas à qu'tu captes ça.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-1.json/e.orig: We're almost there, just down this way.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-1.json/e.text: On y est presque, c'est juste là.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Alright, here we go.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Voilà, on y est.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: This is the part of the cavern that got breached by those darn guards.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: C'est la partie de la caverne qui a été découverte par ces foutus gardes.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Here, take the chip.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Tiens, prend l'émetteur.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: \v[item.344.name]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: \v[item.344.name]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Once I move the box here, the chip will start tracking your movement.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Une fois que j'aurais bougé cette caisse, l'émetteur va commencer à suivre tes mouvements.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Your goal is to find a way to the exit south of here without a guard noticing you.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Ton but est de trouver un moyen d'atteindre la sortie au sud sans qu'un garde ne te remarque.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Talk to me when ya ready, capiche?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Viens m'parler quand tu seras prête, capiche ?

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: And be prepared, because I won't let ya go until ya done, woman.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Et sois prête, parce que je vais pas te laisser repartir avant que t'aies fini, meuf.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Oh wait, before my dad yells at me again. Here's a \c[3]Smokaway\c[0] and some \c[3]Intel on the Guards\c[0] our men found.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Oh, attends, avant que mon père me crie encore dessus. Voilà une \c[3]Bombe fumigène\c[0] et un peu \c[3]d'info sur les gardes\c[0] qu'on a pu trouver.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: \v[item.343.name]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: \v[item.343.name]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: \v[combat.name.jungle/special/guard]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: \v[combat.name.jungle/special/guard]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Use the Smokaway when you get caught, you'll be able to run back here and I'll close the box, got it?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Utilise le fumigène si tu te fais chopper, comme ça, tu pourras courir jusqu'ici et je refermerais le passage, OK ?

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Good, ready when you are.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Bien, je suis prêt quand tu veux.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Ready?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Prête ?

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Alright, talk to me again if ya want to chicken out.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: OK, reviens me parler si t'as trop les chocottes.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Also, don't attack the guards in any way. Don't wanna raise suspicion, right?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Sinon, n'attaque pas les gardes. On veut pas créer d'embrouilles, OK ?

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Use \c[3]Direct Link\c[0] to call me once you're through.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Utilise un \c[3]Direct Link\c[0] pour m'appeler une fois que tu seras passée.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Don't waste my time woman. Get on with it already.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Ne me fais pas perdre mon temps, meuf. Grouille-toi.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Yes
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Oui

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: No
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Non

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Wanna Stop?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Tu veux arrêter ?

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: I knew ya would chicken out.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Je savais que tu aurais les chocottes.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Then don't stand here and find a way woman.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Bon alors ne reste pas là et va trouver un chemin, meuf.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Yes
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Oui

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: No
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Non

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Halt! Who goes there!?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Halte ! Qui va là !?

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Mh... Oh, it's you. Did ya find a way?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Mmm... Oh, c'est toi. T'as trouvé un chemin ?

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Finally! Only took ya \v[map.retiresNeeded] tries.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Enfin ! Ça ne t'a pris que \v[map.retiresNeeded] essais.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Finally! And it only took you one try. I'm actually impressed.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Enfin ! Et tu n'as eu besoin que d'un seul essai. Je suis vraiment impressionné.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Give me a minute, I'll use the same way using the tracker chip I gave you.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Une minute, je vais utiliser le même chemin en utilisant l'émetteur que je t'ai donné.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Damn, woman, was this really the only way?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Bon sang, meuf, y avait pas un autre chemin ?

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: So much walking... \.\.\. Thankfully, I don't have to carry the goods. That would be just awful.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: J'ai dû marcher tout du long... \.\.\. Heureusement, je n'ai pas besoin de porter la marchandise. Ça aurait été horrible.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Don't give me that look, will ya?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Me regarde pas comme ça, tu veux ?

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Ya can go back to my dad with the tracker chip and get your reward.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Tu peux revenir voir mon père avec l'émetteur et obtenir ta récompense.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Ya can keep the \v[item.343.name] and explore this cavern if ya want.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Tu peux garder la \v[item.343.name] et explorer cette grotte si tu veux.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Also, be a good girl and make sure to tell him I helped a lot, gotcha?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Et aussi, sois gentille et dit lui que je t'ai pas mal aidé, kapische ?

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: I *knew* I could count on ya. Now off you go, the rest is just a long small tunnel anyway.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Je "savais" que je pouvais compter sur toi ! Maintenant, va-t'en, le reste, c'est juste un long tunnel étroit t'façon.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: You... what? Come on... at least have some mercy, will ya?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Tu... quoi ? Allez... aie un peu de pitié pour moi, tu veux ?

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Screw it then. Off you go. I can handle the rest without you.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Peu importe. Tire-toi alors. Le reste, je vais m'en occuper moi-même.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Yes
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Oui

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: No
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Non

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: What are you still here for? Go to my dad with the chip already.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Qu'est-ce que tu fous encore là ? Va voir mon père et donne-lui l'émetteur.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Well look who it is.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Ah, regarde un peu qui est là.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Hi...
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Salut...

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Thank to ya, I'm now to stand here almost all day watching the carriers bringing in the goods.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: À cause de toi, il faut que je reste planté là presque toute la journée à surveiller les porteurs qui apportent les marchandises.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: So thanks for that, really nice of ya.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Merci beaucoup pour ça, c'est vraiment très sympa de ta part.
